pageContext.description: Returns a random item from a group of items.
pageContext.name: randItem

returns.description: A random item from the group.

pageContext.usage:
import { randItem } from 'pickitt'

const testArray = ['item1', 'item2', 'item3']

const randomElement = randItem(testArray) // <-- 'item1', 'item2', or 'item3'
